import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "react"; const Modals = () => { const [name, setProductName] = useState([]); const [description, setProductDescription] = useState([]); const [category, setCategory] = useState([]); handleCreate = () => { axios .post("/api/Products", { ProductName: name, ProductDescription: description, Category: category }) .catch(err => console.log(err)); }; return (
